bs-socialtags-tagstext:
Short Label that displays the number of linked pages. Use PLURAL.
* $1 - Number of linked pages
socialtags: Special page name for [[Special:SocialTags]] special page.
bs-socialtags-special-heading: Special page header for [[Special:SocialTags]] special page.
bs-socialtags-special-invalid-title:
Error message when given parameter is not a valid title.
* $1 - Given parameter
